Like-Like, in his beast mode, was partly imune to these shots, and it would=
 take a number of them to sink through his flabby organics, which were very=
 powerful. He hears Magamtron's voice and stops his crashing. He wiggles ar=
ound slowly, his mechanics slightly locked up, but his organics working fin=
e. He liked Magmatron's voice, it sounded nice to him. He wasn't really ver=
y intelligent, but he waited for Magmatron to say something else, in the me=
an time only saying one word:

Like-Like: Master?...
  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday,=
 February 01, 2001 4:54 PM
  Subject: Re: Destron's have a visitor...


  S=
heilds are up.
   
  ::Magmatron::
   
      The external defense system ca=
me online, and shot at the transformer. It was only a stun. Then Magmatron =
sent a comm to the bot, it was his policy, you get a warning shot, then a c=
omm, and if you fail to answer or show hostilities then you die.
      "Wha=
t do you think your doing?!" Magmatron boomed. "Cease and desist, or be des=
troyed."
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Soulstice Omega 
    T=
o: NBW 
    Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 11:37 PM
    Subject: Destron=
's have a visitor...


    Like-Like had been traveling in no direction is =
particular for a long time, and had wandered across land and sea until he m=
ade it to Northern Maine. He moved right up to the Destron base. He stopped=
, he knew there was something obstructing his path, and he didn't want to g=
o around it. Like-Like rammed into the base, and:

    1: (If the shields a=
re down) He rammed into it again and again, howling.

    2: (If the shield=
s are up) He slammed into it, was shocked and burnt by the shields, and the=
n repeated this again and again, creating a black mark on his flabby slimy =
skin...


          Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

    www.
